last_episode_to_air.overview: An extraordinary story of the relationship between nature and the people of the monsoon.

name: Wonders of the Monsoon
overview: Wonders of the Monsoonâ€™ will explore the worlds of such places as the Himalayas to Northern Australia. The show will look at how the wildlife and culture of these places has shaped the Earth through some of its greatest natural phenomena on the planet. The series will take a journey to see how life manages to flourish under the tumultuous weather conditions that annually transforms an enormous part of our planet.

episodes.name: Waiting for the Rains
episodes.overview: From India to Australia, all life awaits the transforming power of the monsoon rains.

episodes.name: Deluge
episodes.overview: The grand entrance of the Asian monsoon. The bringer of life and the destroyer of worlds.

episodes.name: The Drought
episodes.overview: The other side of the monsoon. Now, the winds turn dry and bring drought.

episodes.name: Strange Castaways
episodes.overview: A journey to the heart of the monsoon, a world of strange creatures and tropical islands.

episodes.name: People of the Monsoon
episodes.overview: An extraordinary story of the relationship between nature and the people of the monsoon.
